metadata.title: CVE-2014-8418 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The DB dialplan function in Asterisk Open Source 1.8.x before 1.8.32, 11.xbefore 11.1.4.1, 12.x before 12.7.1, and 13.x before 13.0.1 and CertifiedAsterisk 1.8 before 1.8.28-cert8 and 11.6 before 11.6-cert8 allows remoteauthenticated users to gain privileges via a call from an externalprotocol, as demonstrated by the AMI protocol.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
